Class ConnectionSocketAdministrator

  • java.lang.Object
    • serveur.ConnectionSocketAdministrator

  • public class ConnectionSocketAdministrator
extends java.lang.Object
    class used to administrate a socket connection provide 2 function to read and write on socket and 1 to close the socket.

    dufaux
